options.description: Index of the input plane to be used as the first output plane  (from 0 to 3) (default 0)
options.name: map0

options.description: Index of the input plane to be used as the second output plane  (from 0 to 3) (default 1)
options.name: map1

options.description: Index of the input plane to be used as the third output plane  (from 0 to 3) (default 2)
options.name: map2

options.description: Index of the input plane to be used as the fourth output plane  (from 0 to 3) (default 3)
options.name: map3
